metadata.Title: CVE-2012-5651 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Drupal 6.x before 6.27 and 7.x before 7.18 displays information for blocked users, which might allow remote attackers to obtain sensitive information by reading the search results.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.22-1').
